name: World of Tanks

task.exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe WoTLauncher.exe
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- game:
    filename: WoT_internet_install_eu.exe
    url: https://wot.gcdn.co/eu/files/WoT_internet_install_eu.exe
- modpack1:
    filename: promod.zip
    url: https://www.oldskool.vip/promod/ProMod.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Games/World_of_Tanks/WoTLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /VERYSILENT /CLOSEAPPLICATIONS
    description: Installing World of Tanks
    exclude_processes: explorer.exe rpcss.exe winedevice.exe plugplay.exe WargamingGameUpdater.exe
      WoTLauncher.exe
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win10
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Wine to Windows 10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: drive_c/Games/
    file: modpack1
    format: zip
- task:
    app: corefonts
    arch: win64
    description: install MS core fonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet48
    arch: win64
    description: install .NET 4.8
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dsound
    arch: win64
    description: install DSound
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dmusic
    arch: win64
    description: install DMusic
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: faudio
    arch: win64
    description: install FAudio
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing ProMod
    executable: drive_c/Games/ProMod.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_runtime: false
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 1920x1080
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
